meta.title: Plans and pricing | Varena
meta.description: Reference plans for landing pages, business sites and online stores. Pay in ARS or USD with responsive design and SEO-ready setup.

hero.title: Options and investment ranges
hero.description: Reference prices show the typical investment per project type. Final budgets depend on scope and specific needs. Payments are usually split: 50% on start, 50% on delivery.

cards.label: Landing
cards.title: Plans for a single-offer page
cards.main: For campaigns, launches or focused services.
list: Clear landing with ordered blocks leading to one action.
Designed to generate enquiries, bookings or sign-ups.
Includes WhatsApp button, contact form and social links.
Adapted to phone, tablet and desktop.
cards.note: Your landing goes live ready to publish: design, build, SEO setup and launch.

cards.label: Website
cards.title: Plans for a business website
cards.main: For studios, consultancies and personal brands that need a stable online hub.
list: Homepage plus internal sections (About, Services, FAQ, Contact).
Support for organising content and writing clear copy.
Includes WhatsApp button, contact form and social links.
Design tuned for all screen sizes.
cards.note: Built as your digital hub: a reliable place to present your work.

cards.label: E-commerce
cards.title: Plans for online stores / e-commerce
cards.main: For selling products or services directly from your site.
list: Organised product catalog with photos, descriptions and pricing.
Checkout flow with payment and shipping options.
SEO-friendly structure so you can grow later.
cards.note: Ideal to move from a showcase to an actual store with detailed options.
